items.title: Massive fire erupts at nursing home in Pennsylvania
items.description: A massive fire has erupted at a nursing home in eastern Pennsylvania following a possible gas explosion, officials said.

items.title: Trump says it would be 'smart' for Venezuela's Maduro to step down
items.description: President Trump continues to ramp up pressure on Venezuela's Nicholas Maduro, saying it would be "smart" for him to step down and warning him not to p...

items.title: WATCH:  Alabama football player brings Christmas joy to local children
items.description: Crimson Tide center Parker Brailsford used money from his (NIL) name, image and likeness deal to give 10 kids a brighter Christmas.

items.title: WATCH:  Mom thwarts burglars by ramming them with her car
items.description: A California mom was caught on video driving her car into the vehicle of burglars attempting to escape a home they robbed.

items.title: Latest Epstein release details investigation into possible co-conspirators
items.description: The Justice Department on Monday released additional documents from its files on the convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.
